info.author: Tom De Smedt, Frederik De Bleser
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description: NodeBox for OpenGL is a free, cross-platform library for generating 2D animations with Python programming code. It is built on Pyglet and adopts the drawing API from NodeBox for Mac OS X. It has built-in support for paths, layers, motion tweening, hardware-accelerated image effects, simple physics and interactivity.
info.name: NodeBox-for-OpenGL
info.html_description: NodeBox for OpenGL is a free, cross-platform library for generating 2D animations with Python programming code. It is built on Pyglet and adopts the drawing API from NodeBox for Mac OS X. It has built-in support for paths, layers, motion tweening, hardware-accelerated image effects, simple physics and interactivity.
